name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty topped with melted cheese, served on a toasted bun.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Grilled chicken breast served on a bed of creamy Alfredo pasta.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with golden fries.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup made with miso paste, tofu, and seaweed.

name: Taco Salad
description: Crispy tortilla shell filled with lettuce, seasoned ground beef, cheese, tomatoes, and salsa.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi rolls, sashimi, and nigiri sushi.

name: Chicken Shawarma
description: Thinly sliced marinated chicken wrapped in a warm pita with garlic sauce and veggies.

name: Chocolate Brownie
description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownie topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
